name: Rolling Isles
description:
Rolling Isles

A small puzzle game, where you play as a Dice.

Collect numbered sides for your dice to get past obstacles.

How To Play

Keyboard and Mouse:

  1. Movement - Arrow Keys
  2. Pause - ESC

Twitter: @DeveloperTom1

Website/Blog: https://www.tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/

This game was created for the GMTKJAM event in 48 hours.
